name: notepad_bring_magwa_to_mazum
displayName: I bet he'll get high on this!

name: notepad_logar
displayName: Is he a dealer or what?

name: notepad_ilott_riss_counters
displayName: So the Riss counters know, huh?

name: notepad_riss_stone
displayName: I think I kinda understood that.

name: notepad_recreators
displayName: So you're the engineers here, aren't you?

name: notepad_music
displayName: I hope it'll be some disco tune!

name: notepad_sadar_problem
displayName: Ah come on, why am I the only one working here?

name: notepad_mar_soldiers
displayName: That's not a problem, my friend. That's a solution for my blood lust!

name: notepad_zele_ammo
displayName: Whatever you need, my friend. As long as I get the ammo!

name: notepad_break_machine
displayName: Damage? I'm always in when damage is needed!

name: notepad_pure_mine
displayName: Pure piece of Helidium? I like that!

name: notepad_mobarr
displayName: Why would you want it back? Ah, whatever...

name: notepad_zogard_deal
displayName: Hey, be careful with that, okay?

name: notepad_find_zakk
displayName: Zakk, I need a handle... Fast!

name: notepad_got_handle
displayName: Let's free Zogard! For good, this time.

name: notepad_yagu
displayName: Okay, I'll tell him, I'll tell him!

name: notepad_yagu_ezef_dead
displayName: How am I gonna explain this...

name: notepad_mored
displayName: Sometimes, I feel like I'm not rewarded enough.

name: notepad_gizo_return
displayName: And me? Can I get a reward too?

name: notepad_marion_house
displayName: She just can't get into enough trouble, can she?!

name: notepad_azirad_skill
displayName: Enhance my weapons? I like where this is going.

name: notepad_zot_fight
displayName: And what if I like fights? Why should I interrupt them?

name: notepad_zot_soldiers
displayName: Well, I'll have to do something about that.

name: notepad_song
displayName: Singing? I can't sing! And I don't want to!

name: notepad_daro_kroax
displayName: Let's go to the Darothing then!

name: notepad_accident
displayName: I always knew I'd become a miner someday...

name: notepad_marion_two
displayName: Ah come on, can't she just defend herself?

name: notepad_marion_three
displayName: I'm the only one capable here.

name: notepad_guardians_forest
displayName: I really want this to be over!

name: notepad_kaleb_oru
displayName: This old hermit might be useful!
